> <OLD>
>
> Nightlight reluctany walks, she said  "Where are we going???"

<NEW>

The SHARKTICON guards laugh, "We take you to your doom!" They began
pushing her onto the disk that would transport her to wherever it was
that SABERBACK just went.

One of the guards turned to the technician and nodded, letting him
know to transport.

The Tecnician turned back to his console, pressed a few buttons and then . . .

THE WHOLE ROOM WENT COMPLETELY DARK!

There were sounds of energy blasts. The room lit up in spots as energy
from laser fire temporarilly showed seens of SHARKTICONS being blasted
and even one showing the technician being struck and slumping over on
his console.

Then the whole room went silent for a moment.

"Are you okay." A voice said in the darkness, one that NIGHTLIGHT had
never heard before, but it did sound friendly.

Another voice said, "I hope she is, cause we gotta move, now!"

(TAG)

- Preston
